text.en: Infinite Life, foremost guide for beings in this world,
text.en-trans: jikten drenpé tsowo tsepakmé

text.en: You are the one who overcomes all untimely death,
text.en-trans: dümin chiwa malü jom dzepa

text.en: A refuge for those who suffer without protection—
text.en-trans: gönmé dukngal gyurpa nam kyi kyab

text.en: Buddha Amitāyus, homage and praise to you!
text.en-trans: sangye tsepakmé la chaktsal tö

text.en: Everywhere ablaze with everlasting radiance,
text.en-trans: künné küntu özer rab bar zhing

text.en: You bestow boundless life and boundless wisdom.
text.en-trans: tsé dang yeshe pakmé tsol dzepa

text.en: The thought of you dispels the fear of untimely death.
text.en-trans: drenpé dümin chiwé jikpa jom

text.en: Bhagavān Amitāyus, homage and praise to you!
text.en-trans: chomden tsepakmé la chaktsal tö

text.en: Your form is resplendent, like a mountain of ruby
text.en-trans: khyö ku pema ragé lhünpo la

text.en: Held in the light of a thousand suns,
text.en-trans: nyinjé tong gi khyüpé ziji chen

text.en: And strewn with the vivid flowers of the signs and marks.
text.en-trans: tsen dang pejé metok nampar tra

text.en: Amitāyus of Boundless Light, homage and praise to you!
text.en-trans: nangta tsepakmé la chaktsal tö

text.en: Your speech resounds with sixty melodious tones,
text.en-trans: sung yang yenlak drukchü dra drok shing

text.en: A single voice extending through infinite realms.
text.en-trans: tayé zhing na sung chik gi khyabpa

text.en: Master of limitless and inexhaustible discourse,
text.en-trans: zé mishepé sung tayepé dak

text.en: Amitāyus of Vajra Speech, to you I offer praise.
text.en-trans: sung gi dorjé tsé tayé la tö

text.en: You enter and arise from an ocean of samādhi,
text.en-trans: tingdzin gyatsor juk ching dangwa dang

text.en: Master of the ten powers freed from every veil,
text.en-trans: tob chü wangchuk dribpa kün lé drol

text.en: Your oceanic wisdom spontaneously present,
text.en-trans: yeshe gyatso lhüngyi drubpa yi

text.en: Lord of Boundless Radiance, to you I offer praise.
text.en-trans: gönpo önang pata yé la tö

text.en: In immense palaces within infinite realms you preside
text.en-trans: zhing dang zhalyé köpa tayé shing

text.en: Amidst the buddhas and their heirs from every direction,
text.en-trans: chok chü gyal dang dé sé tsok kyi ü

text.en: As you savour together the Dharma of the Great Vehicle.
text.en-trans: lhenchik tekchen chö la longchö ching

text.en: King of Jewel-like Brilliance, to you I offer praise.
text.en-trans: rinchen ziji gyalpo khyö la tö

text.en: Your activity is unending, equal to space itself,
text.en-trans: trinlé dzemé namkhé ta dang nyam

text.en: You ripen and liberate oceans of disciples.
text.en-trans: dulja gyatso min ching drolwar dzé

text.en: Your emanations are limitless, lord of the blissful realm,
text.en-trans: namtrul tayé deden zhing gi gön

text.en: Amitāyus of Infinite Deeds, to you I offer praise.
text.en-trans: dzepa pakmé tsé tayé la tö

text.en: Through praising you in this way, may untimely death be pacified,
text.en-trans: detar töpé dümin chiwa zhi

text.en: And, having fully actualized the three doors as the three vajras,
text.en-trans: go sum dorjé sum du rab drub né

text.en: May I plant the iron tree of indestructible, vajra-like vitality
text.en-trans: tsesok mi shik dorjé chak dong tsuk

text.en: And attain the level of the protector Vajra Amitāyus.
text.en-trans: dorjé tsepakmé gön drubpar shok
